snippet.title: I actually made Better Call Saul for the Nintendo DS
snippet.description:
Download: https://github.com/WiIIiam278/BCSDS/releases

For the best experience, copy bcsds.nds to a flash cart of your choice and run it on hardware. (Hamlindigo Blue™ systems especially!)

If you'd like to emulate it, you can use No$GBA, DeSMuME or MelonDS (with FIFO/homebrew mode enabled)

Source code, copyright stuff and more info: https://github.com/WiIIiam278/BCSDS

No copyright infringement intended. I mean, I probably did infringe on their copyrights, but this thing is funny (to me) - and put it this way:
"I did it for me. I liked it."
